title: Low priority ques one after the other
body:
This is my fourth set of 5 low priority ques... WHAT'S GOING ON RIOT????? WHAT DID I DO?

1st one understandable, even though they were out of my control. Second one, no idea how (honestly no clue on why i got it), third one coz I had no option but to leave (real life emergency), NOW THIS one, THIS ONE WAS COMPLETELY THE CLIENT'S FAULT!!! 

i just finished low priority, and now i get hit with another one for failing to get past lobby screen coz my league client was faulty and needed to repair, how in the hell could i know about this before hand??? i get to 68% in the lobby screen and then BAM! SYSTEM ERROR, try everything nope, nothing works. Restart computer, takes ages. Load up client and i'm hit with the your client will be re rolled something something to the previous version. 

AND NOW I'M IN ANOTHER LOW PRIORITY QUE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

AND YES I KNOW I'M SPELLING IT WRONG!

pls help me
